description: Updates the parameters of a parameter group. You can modify up to 20 parameters in a single request by submitting a list parameter name and value pairs.

parameters.name: ParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the parameter group to update.

parameters.name: ParameterNameValues
parameters.description: An array of parameter names and values for the parameter update. You must supply at least one parameter name and value; subsequent arguments are optional. A maximum of 20 parameters may be updated per request. (dict) --- Describes a name-value pair that is used to update the value of a parameter. ParameterName (string) --- The name of the parameter ParameterValue (string) --- The value of the parameter.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter group.

nested_items.name: Family
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter group family that this parameter group is compatible with.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the parameter group.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parameter group.
